title: AUCTION ALERT
content:
Whether you're a budding filmmaker or a Hollywood pro, our Movie Set Spotlights are sure to give your productions that extra touch of class. These stunning spotlights are crafted from high-quality chrome and sit atop a sturdy tripod stand, making them perfect for any set. At ten inches tall, they provide plenty of light to ensure your shots are well-lit and cinematic. Plus, their sleek design is sure to add a touch of glamour to any production. So if you're looking to take your films to the next level, be sure to invest in a few of our Movie Set Spotlights. 

 Check out lot Movie Set Spotlights - Chrome on Tripod Stand - approx. twenty inches tall and place your bid now! Link for auction in the comment/bio!!!!

title: Gift Sale
content:
If you're like us, one of the ways you show affection is through gift-giving. Since Valentines Day is for love (and self-loved), what better way to show you care than with a little something-something? 

 Say 'I love you' with a Dyson hairdryer, luxury fragrances from brands like Prada, home scents, and more. When it comes to gifts, our curated list has got you covered so go ahead and treat the ones you love.

title: Saving money when you shop
content:
Saving money when you shop is important, but so is doing our best to help the environment. When you shop eBay Refurbished, you're doing both.  

 You help extend the life of quality devices, reduce harmful waste, and limit our environmental impact. 

 So feel good about great savings and help the planet keep on keeping on.
